summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TempMail application. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend UI works well but has clipboard permission issues that cause overlay problems during normal interactions.

ui_bugs.issue: Clipboard write permission denied causing webpack overlay to block interactions
ui_bugs.details: NotAllowedError: Failed to execute 'writeText' on 'Clipboard': Write permission denied. This creates an overlay that blocks normal clicks.

integration_issues.issue: Webpack dev server overlay intercepts pointer events when clipboard errors occur
affected_selectors: All clickable elements when overlay is present
integration_issues.workaround: Force clicks bypass the overlay issue

success_percentage.frontend: 90% - All features work but clipboard issues affect user experience

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix clipboard permission issues in the frontend. The copyToClipboard function is causing NotAllowedError which triggers webpack overlay blocking interactions. Consider implementing fallback clipboard methods or handling permissions properly.
